name: Poppy's Carnevil
description:
Poppy the clown has trapped you in his evil carnival. Can you get retrieve the souls of the five dead children and set them free before the vengeful spirits consume you?

There are five booths, you need to visit each one and beat the minigame there. Walk up to the booths and press E to play the game. Each game you beat will give you a ghost, when you collect all of the ghosts you can place them on hands in the center with the E button. 

Due to time restraints one of the booths does not have minigame but instead just instantly exits. This is normal.

Controls

Walk -WASD

Camera - Mouse

Interact - E
